_comment: This data is an early work-in-progress and contains errors. Produced by @michaelh at Discuss and Discover SuttaCentral forum - please get in touch! Finished code forthcoming.

Five qualities of a person who should no: They make decisions prejudiced by favoritism
They make decisions prejudiced by hostility
They make decisions prejudiced by stupidity
They make decisions prejudiced by cowardice
They don’t know if a meal has been assigned or not
Five qualities of a person who should be: They don’t make decisions prejudiced by favoritism
They don’t make decisions prejudiced by hostility
They don’t make decisions prejudiced by stupidity
They don’t make decisions prejudiced by cowardice
They know if a meal has been assigned or not
Five qualities of a person who has been: Should be known as a fool
They keep themselves broken and damaged or unbroken and undamaged
Five qualities of a meal assigner who is: They don’t make decisions prejudiced by favoritism
They don’t make decisions prejudiced by hostility
They don’t make decisions prejudiced by stupidity
They don’t make decisions prejudiced by cowardice
They know if a meal has been assigned or not
